item.title: 90 Day Mentoring Challenge 90 send Ad (no audio) - Upwork
item.description:
Visual Ad Outline for 90 Day Mentoring Challenge
Total time 30 Seconds
Aspect Ration 16:9
No sound

Opening (0-5s):

Display: "Accelerate Your Dynamics 365 & Power Platform Career"
Background: Dynamic visuals of professionals working in tech.
Section 1 (5-10s):

Text: "Struggling to advance in your career?"
Imagery: Person looking confused, overwhelmed by choices.
Section 2 (10-15s):

Text: "Join the 90 Day Mentoring Challenge"
Imagery: Enthusiastic group of learners.
Section 3 (15-20s):

Text: "Over 1000 participants from 69 countries"
Text: "40+ MVPs emerged from our challenge"
Imagery: Global map with highlighted countries and MVP badges.
Section 4 (20-25s):

Text: "Real Success Stories"
Imagery: Screenshots of two written testimonials (ensure legibility).
Closing (25-30s):

Text: "Transform Your Career in 90 Days"
Imagery: Success stories, participants celebrating achievements.
Text: "Get 10% off with code: KILTS"
Text: "Enroll Now at Ako.nz365guy.com"
Background: Logo, website URL, and call to action.


Notes for Designer:
The event will be played at this event: https://www.scottishsummit.com (incorporate this brand as needed)
I have purchased 30 spots at 30 sencond length to be played on big screen without audio.
Ensure all branding is alignd with my branding doument supplied
Incorporate smooth transitions between sections.
Animate the 90 Day Mentoring Challenge Logo if needed
Mark Smiths personal brand online in nz365guy


Posted On: June 25, 2024 04:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: New Zealand
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Mashup Vlog Videos with Face Blur - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create mashup vlog videos for a tik tok/ instagram page . The main requirement is to blur out the face of the vlogger in each video and add sub titles. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing vlogs and be proficient in video editing software. Attention to detail and the ability to work with tight deadlines are essential for this role. Good communication skills and the ability to understand creative briefs are also important.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Face blurring
- Vlog editing
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Communication skills

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 04:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
